<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.ui.list_v3_components" name="List v3 Components" version="1.0.0" state="published" cache_invalidate="true" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <description>List v3 Components (including REST endpoints, directives, and templates)</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.list_api"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng" /> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.amb" /> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.form_elements"/> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.ng.filter"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.report.charting_v2" /> </requires> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>List v3 Components (including REST endpoints, directives, and templates)</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.ui.list_v3_components</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>List v3 Components</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.ui.list_v3_components/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.ui.list_api,com.glide.ui.ng,com.glide.ui.ng.amb,com.glide.ui.ng.form_elements,com.glide.ui.ng.filter,com.glideapp.report.charting_v2</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.ui.list_v3_components</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
